main event: A civilian reported seeing a slow-moving object in the sky resembling a star or satellite in South Jamesport, New York, on May 5, 1966.
interesting points: The object was bright red, changing to blue and then fading away,The sighting lasted approximately 20 minutes,The object drifted in a saccadic motion about 500 feet in the sky,It flew at a 25-degree angle towards the north before changing direction,There were at least 13 other people who reported seeing the light.
sighted object: One bright object changing colors in the sky
witness description: One witness, a builder from South Jamesport, NY, sounded sincere and was well-educated.
